title: Kerala High Court Issues Notice To RSS Members Allegedly Imparting Weapon Training At Temple; Seeks Response From State, Devaswom Board
selftext:
Source multiple , providing one : https://www.livelaw.in/high-court/kerala-high-court/kerala-high-court-rss-weapon-training-notice-temple-board-230951

What is happening in the country?
comments:
>The petitioners claim that the RSS and other occupants from the organization are using tobacco products within the temple premises....

I remember these a-holes used to [attack bars](https://m.rediff.com/news/1999/apr/05rss.htm) which were close to temples.

Eradicate caste discrimination in temples, Sanghis.


Or, is this your twisted way of doing exactly that?
